document_notes.text:
This update for java-1_7_1-ibm fixes the following issues:

- Version update to 7.1-3.60 (bsc#1009280) fixing the following CVE's:
  CVE-2016-5568, CVE-2016-5556, CVE-2016-5573, CVE-2016-5597, CVE-2016-5554,
  CVE-2016-5542
